block_comment: This code block's purpose is to trigger a dynamic timing check whenever the 14th bit (index 13) in the "dm_in" data vector changes. This functionality is achieved by using an 'always' block with sensitivity to the 14th bit of the "dm_in" data vector. When this specified bit changes state, the 'dm_timing_check' function is invoked with the index value "13" passed as an argument.
